meanings.definition: One who offers something for acceptance or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The profferer handed me a delicious cookie.
meanings.sent2: The kind profferer shared his umbrella with me during the rainstorm.
meanings.sent3: The profferer surprised everyone by offering free ice cream to all.
meanings.sent4: She was a profferer of wisdom, always ready to share her knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The profferer of gifts made everyone smile with his generosity.

meanings.definition: To offer or present for acceptance.
meanings.sent1: I proffered my help to carry the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: He proffered his apologies for the mistake he made.
meanings.sent3: The magician proffered a bouquet of flowers out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: She proffered her hand in friendship to the new student.
meanings.sent5: The shopkeeper proffered a sample of the delicious cheese for us to taste.
